object.name: contributor
object.property: <model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="email" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>The main email address that you use</description> <title>Primary email</title> </field> <field name="cover" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Cover photo</title> </field> <field name="quote" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Quote</title> </field> <field name="country" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <default>NOR</default> <title>Country</title> <required>False</required> <source>ploneorg.core.vocabularies.country_vocabulary</source> </field> <field name="city" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>City</title> <required>False</required> </field> <fieldset name="contributions" label="Contributions"> <field name="github_username" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>GitHub username</title> </field> <field name="stackoverflow_username" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>StackOverflow username</title> </field> <field name="additional_emails" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Contributions are usually keyed on email, but often people use work and home addresses for email, or move jobs and gain new addresses. Enter all email addresses that represent you in the Plone community here, so we can include these contributions.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Additional emails</title> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
